dct_title_s: W. & A.K. Johnston's Map of the Klondike Goldfields
dct_alternative_sm: W.& A.K. Johnston's Map of the Klondike Goldfields
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles."
Shows topography, drainage, political boundaries, cities and towns.
Inset world map includes submarine telegraph cables.
Title and descriptive text on 6 panels of verso; text provides description, routes, and mining regulations.
2 inset maps: World on Mercator's projection : Showing routes to Klondike -- Canada : Showing routes to Klondike.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
